title: How to Unlock Club LOL on Animal Crossing: New Leaf

steps.headline: Spend the right amount of Bells in the shop that is originally Nookling Junction.
steps.description: This will allow it to be upgraded into T&T Mart. You need to have a house instead of a tent to be able to get T&T Mart. To do this you must give 10,000 Bells to Tom Nook that will go towards your mortgage. You will also have to have spent at least 12,000 Bells in Nookling Junction (or buy at least 15 items). It will take 10 days after the creation of the Town for the option to upgrade to appear.

steps.headline: Wait one day after Nookling Junction has been upgraded.
steps.description: If you don't want to wait, then you are able to fast forward time from the main menu.

steps.headline: Leave your house first thing that morning.
steps.description: Dr. Shrunk should be outside. He will automatically talk to you. He is the owner of Club LOL.

steps.headline: Give Shrunk permission to build.
steps.description: You will then collect six different signatures from the villagers. Once you've gotten all six, return the clipboard with the signatures to Shrunk, who should be in Main Street.

steps.headline: Wait 4-8 days.
steps.description: After this time period, the club will be ready. Once again, if you do not want to wait, you are able to fast forward time in the main menu.

steps.headline: Enjoy the activities that Club LOL has to offer.
